frameDefinitions: An Agent changes a Part of a complex entity with regard to some Feature in order to achieve some Imposed_purpose affected by the Feature.
A Money_owner exchanges Sum_1 in the  Source_currency for Sum_2 in the Target_currency at some Exchange_service.
An Agent or Cause causes an Entity to change, either in its category membership or in terms of the value of an Attribute.
An Experimenter conducts an Experiment based on a Hypothesis.
An Agent changes Tools, from the Old_tool to a New_tool.
frameExamples: I need to <t>adjust</t> the thermostat to around 80 degrees when she visits.
After checking into the Intourist-operated $30-a-day Hotel Zerafshon, we each <t>exchanged</t> $50 for Uzbek currency with a shifty loiterer in the lobby at the rate .
Our storylines follows the saga outlined by the Ultima Series, but we have <t>modified</t> it in order to make our writing more cohesive.
Johann's <t><fex name='Experiment'>experiment</fex></t> proved the new drug was effective in treating the disease.
If this happens one more time, we 're going to <t>switch</t> operating systems.
listRoleDefinitions: The individual that controls the value of a <fen>Feature</fen>.
The part of the complex entity which is changed in the process of adjusting.
The <fen>Feature</fen> with respect to which the <fen>Part</fen> is adjusted.
The time at which the adjusting occurs.
The location where the adjusting takes place.
The person who exchanges <fen>Sum_1</fen> for <fen>Sum_2</fen>.
An amount of money in the <fen>Source_currency</fen> that the <fen>Money_owner</fen> exchanges for an amount in the <fen>Target_currency</fen>.
The kind of currency of the <fen>Money_owner</fen> has before the exchange.
The amount of money in the <fen>Target_currency</fen> that the <fen>Money_owner</fen> receives in exchange for <fen>Sum_1</fen>.
The kind of currency that the <fen>Money_owner</fen> receives as part of the exchange.
Currency that is being exchanged by the <fen>Money_owner</fen>.
The time when the currency is exchanged.
The location where the money is exchanged.
The sentient entity that effects a change in the <fen>Entity</fen>.
The category of which the <fen>Entity</fen> is a member before the <fen>Agent</fen> causes a change.
The category that the <fen>Entity</fen> belongs to after it has undergone the change.
The value that the <fen>Attribute</fen> assumes as a result of the change that the <fen>Entity</fen> is caused to undergo.
The value that the <fen>Attribute</fen> has before the change takes place.
A characteristic of the <fen>Entity</fen> for which a value can be assigned or determined by calculation, measurement , or observation.
The abstract or concrete thing or situation that the <fen>Agent</fen> causes to change.
An event that causes a change in the <fen>Entity</fen>.
The time at which the change of the <fen>Entity</fen> is caused.
The location where the change of the <fen>Entity</fen> is caused.
The <fen>Experimenter</fen> is the individual conducting the <fen>Experiment</fen>.
The group of entities in the <fen>Experiment</fen> which have not been treated and are compared to the <fen>Treatment_group</fen> or <fen>Treated_individual</fen>.
An individual entity of the <fen>Experiment</fen> which is left untreated and then compared with the <fen>Treatment_group</fen> or the <fen>Treated_individual</fen>.
A group of subjects that receive Treatment and are compared to the <fen>Control_group</fen> or <fex name='Controlled_individual'>Controlled_individuals</fex>.
An individual subject that receives treatment and is then compared to the <fen>Control_group</fen> or <fen>Controlled_individual</fen>.
The test or <fen>Experiment</fen> conducted by the <fen>Experimenter</fen> using a <fen>Control_group</fen> and a <fen>Treatment_group</fen>.
The <fen>Hypothesis</fen> is a conjecture as to the result of an <fen>Experiment</fen>.  The <fen>Experiment</fen> takes place in order to prove the <fen>Hypothesis</fen> as correct or incorrect.

In this frame <fen>Control_group</fen> and <fen>Treatment_group</fen> can be combined and expressed as <fen>Subjects</fen>.  This role can also be used for a generic individual on whom the <fen>Experiment</fen> is being conducted (see second example).
The <fen>Topic</fen> is the subject that the <fen>Experiment</fen> is studying.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Experimenter</fen> conducts the <fen>Experiment</fen>.
The <fen>Place</fen> in which the <fen>Experiment</fen> is conducted.
The individual that changes their situation.
The entities controlled by an Agent to achieve some Purpose.
The tool that the <fen>Agent</fen> had been using.
The tool that the <fen>Agent</fen> ends up using.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Agent</fen> acts intentionally.
This role identifies the place where the <fen>Agent</fen> makes a change.
listRoleExamples: She adjusted <fex>the injectors</fex> to make the mixture leaner.
She adjusted <fex>the temperature of the oven</fex> so that the pie crust would brown a little.
<fex>Kornfeldt</fex> hurried through customs, grabbed a city map at a tourist information desk, changed $40 USD into about 300 Hong Kong dollars before leaving the airport
I said forget it and just exchanged <fex>$40 US cash</fex> into $47 and change in Canadian.
We stopped at a bank were we exchanged <fex>Euros</fex> for Danish money.
On the bus we exchanged $50 <fex>for 1410 rubles</fex>.
We had exchanged $100 <fex>into francs</fex> in LAX to be able to pay for the cab ride upon arrival.
I exchanged $1000 <fex>of my money</fex> at the bank.
We walked around Eyre Square and exchanged money <fex>before walking into Taaffes pub and grabbing my first draught pint of Guinness of the trip</fex>.
I exchanged $100 <fex>in Croatia</fex> because i needed a round trip bus ticket to sarajevo.
<fex>The system administrator</fex> changed the value from 'KDE' to 'GNOME', and then restarted the system.
Her time with the Healer Craft has changed her <fex>from a shy, nervous young girl</fex> into a confident (almost) young woman
The radical message of the cross transformed Saul of Tarsus and changed him from a persecutor of Christians <fex>to a tender believer</fex>.
We changed the size from 8 1/2x11 <fex>to a larger 11 x 17</fex> and gave it a complete graphical makeover.
My dad changed his hair color <fex>from red</fex>  to blue today.
We changed <fex>the price</fex> from $1.26 to $1.27 per pint.
The recent terrorist attacks had changed <fex>the political climate</fex>.
<fex>Major technological innovations</fex> changed the social and economic conditions.
He changed it <fex>after David Bowie told him that only twerps have the same first and last name</fex>.
<fex>In his own room</fex> he had modified nothing.
<fex>Justin's</fex> experiment turned out to be rather successful.
<fex>One rat's</fex> treatment caused it to outlive the rats of the control group.
Katrina tested <fex>her hypothesis</fex> yesterday afternoon.
They were hoping to conduct an experiment <fex>on the albino rats</fex>.
Jimmy conducted an experiment <fex>on tropical plants in non-tropical environments</fex>.
